Info.Description:
Adds a distortion to the image based on a noise pattern, creating a warping or rippling effect.
It's a useful tool for creating artistic effects or mimicking certain natural phenomena like heat haze or underwater distortion.

Properties.Name: Scale
Properties.Summary: Controls the size of the noise pattern used for the distortion. A larger scale will produce broader, larger distortions, while a smaller scale results in finer, smaller distortions.

Properties.Name: Strength
Properties.Summary: Adjusts the intensity of the distortion. A higher strength value amplifies the distortion effect, while a lower value makes the distortion more subtle.

Properties.Name: Confined
Properties.Summary: Confines the distortion effect to the borders of the image, preventing it from spilling over the edge.
